name: Udemy
description: Our mission is to transform lives through learning. Through our global marketplace platform, we provide the tools learners, instructors, and enterprises need to achieve their goals and reach their full potential.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Where possibilities begin.
ShortDescription: Udemy's mission is to improve lives through learning by providing flexible, effective skill development.

Highlights.name: Hands-on training
Highlights.description: Upskill effectively with AI-powered coding exercises, practice tests, skills assessments, labs, and workspaces.

Highlights.name: Certification prep
Highlights.description: Prep for industry-recognized certifications by solving real-world challenges and earn badges along the way.

Highlights.name: Accelerate growth — for you or your organization
Highlights.description: Reach goals faster with one of our plans or programs.

enhanced_description: Udemy is a global marketplace platform dedicated to transforming lives through learning by providing tools for learners, instructors, and enterprises to achieve their goals and accelerate skill development and learning efficiency. It offers online, corporate, and professional development learning, including hands-on training with AI-powered coding exercises, practice tests, skills assessments, labs, and workspaces. The platform also supports industry certification preparation through real-world challenges and badge earning, facilitating skill acquisition, learning optimization, and continuous learning initiatives.
competitive_advantages: Global marketplace platform offering diverse content
AI-powered hands-on training tools (coding exercises, labs, workspaces)
Focus on industry certification preparation and skill assessments
Flexible and effective skill development programs
hr_functions_supported: Talent Management (specifically skill development and upskilling)
scalability_features: Designed for large numbers of learners and content
